content: it s a spring fling zauberball cotton 1 was our choice for this shawl and we just love how it knits up this shawl is worked in garter stitch with an eyelet row at the end of the repeat it ends with a pretty picot bind-off change up the garter and eyelet row to make your own spring fling finished size 72 long x 10 deep 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/zauberball-cotton-x31468009 htm
